text: He muminagana! Tomadera dasadasira ebam tomadera madhye yara prapta bayaska hayani tara yena tina samaye tomadera kache anumati grahana kare, phajarera namayera purbe, dupure yakhana tomara bastra khule rakha ebam esara namayera para. E'i tina samaya tomadera deha kholara samaya. E samayera para tomadera o tadera jan'ye kona dosa ne'i. Tomadera eke aparera kache to yatayata karate'i haya, emani bhabe allaha tomadera kache suspasta ayatasamuha bibrta karena. Allaha sarbajna, prajnamaya.
